dependencies.description:
cURL is an open source command line tool and library for transferring
data with URL syntax
dependencies.name: curl

dependencies.description:
FFTW is a C subroutine library for computing the discrete Fourier
transform (DFT) in one or more dimensions, of arbitrary input size, and
of both real and complex data (as well as of even/odd data, i.e. the
discrete cosine/sine transforms or DCT/DST). We believe that FFTW, which
is free software, should become the FFT library of choice for most
applications.
dependencies.name: fftw

dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
libjpeg is a widely used free library with functions for handling the
JPEG image data format. It implements a JPEG codec (encoding and
decoding) alongside various utilities for handling JPEG data.
dependencies.name: libjpeg

dependencies.description: libpng is the official PNG reference library.
dependencies.name: libpng

dependencies.description: LibTIFF - Tag Image File Format (TIFF) Library and Utilities.
dependencies.name: libtiff

dependencies.description: libX11 - Core X11 protocol client library.
dependencies.name: libx11

dependencies.description:
The libXau package contains a library implementing the X11 Authorization
Protocol. This is useful for restricting client access to the display.
dependencies.name: libxau

dependencies.description:
The X protocol C-language Binding (XCB) is a replacement for Xlib
featuring a small footprint, latency hiding, direct access to the
protocol, improved threading support, and extensibility.
dependencies.name: libxcb

dependencies.description:
OpenCV (Open Source Computer Vision Library) is an open source computer
vision and machine learning software library.
dependencies.name: opencv

dependencies.description: OpenEXR Graphics Tools (high dynamic-range image file format)
dependencies.name: openexr

dependencies.description: zlib replacement with optimizations for next generation systems.
dependencies.name: zlib-api

dependencies.description:
Zstandard, or zstd as short version, is a fast lossless compression
algorithm, targeting real-time compression scenarios at zlib-level and
better compression ratios.
dependencies.name: zstd

description:
G'MIC is an open-source framework for digital image processing. G'MIC is
a full-featured open-source framework for digital image processing,
distributed under the CeCILL free software licenses (LGPL-like and/or
GPL-compatible). It provides several user interfaces to convert /
process / visualize generic image datasets, ranging from 1D scalar
signals to 3D+t sequences of multi-spectral volumetric images, hence
including 2D color images.
name: gmic

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
